item.description:
This is a very pretty area with trails through fields and woods, located just minutes from the Montague Center common. The Sawmill River intersects the area which is lush with wildflowers, trees, and butterflies. Come enjoy a fall stroll! Dogs should be on leash to begin with. This is a dog friendly area, please be prepared to pick up, there are is a trash can and usually there are bags available on site.

You can see pictures:
http://www.new.facebo...
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a black lab with a bright blue leash

group.name: Western Mass Dogs - Walks and more!

item.name: Montague Ctr. Wildlife Management Area
